Show only a limited number of files in the main screen

Since we used nestedview, showing to much items will decrease the performance
and may the app crash. Just limited the number of file items shown to a
maximum number of 50 and add a link item indicating more items exists. The
diff view activity can navigate between items without performance degradation
or crash.

title: Revert support library to fix parcelable error cause by the new lifecycle components
message:
Revert support library to fix parcelable error cause by the new lifecycle components

The new 26.1.0 is causing:

"Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Parcel android.os.Parcel@6e624bf: Unmarshalling unknown type"

when activity is recreated. Basically 26.1.0 is a new release to support lifecycle and
new component architecture. Just revert to 26.0.2 until Google fix the problem or find
a proper patch to avoid the crashes.
